title: Commission on Military Justice and Fairness Act
content: Commission on Military Justice and Fairness Act - Establishes the Commission on Military Justice and Fairness to investigate and report findings and recommendations to the President and the Congress concerning: (1) the existence of adequate safeguards for military personnel who report incidents of sexual misconduct, sexual harassment, or unlawful gender discrimination. (2) the existence of adequate mechanisms for investigating such incidents, including the appropriate training of investigative personnel. (3) the availability of adequate mechanisms for the resolution of complaints involving such conduct, either through administrative hearing or court-martial. And (4) military justice system procedures and related matters with regard to such cases.
